issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

This method should only be accessed from tests or within private scope
This method should only be accessed from tests or within private scope
Do not use `javax.swing.SwingWorker`, use `com.intellij.util.concurrency.SwingWorker` instead. See `go/do-not-freeze`.
Method getPalette is slow and thus should run on a worker thread, yet the currently inferred thread is the UI thread
